original_title: Mickey and Minnie Wish Upon a Christmas
overview: After a series of mishaps, Mickey, Minnie and the gang are separated all over the world and must try to get back to Hot Dog Hills by Christmas Eve. A mysterious and jolly stranger shows up to tell them about The Wishing Star, which could be the secret to bringing everybody home in time to celebrate together.
title: Mickey and Minnie Wish Upon a Christmas
